pr_title: [SCRIPTS ONLY] removing the info on checks on WFLY issues and docker …

timeline.message: [SCRIPTS ONLY] removing the info on checks on WFLY issues and docker check

timeline.bodyText: Until we have the next minor we would probably push updates to docker but as we have a 5.10 so we don't need to do this for this branch still but in future we would think when is the right time to remove this step
timeline.author: tomjenkinson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -43,10 +35,6 @@ then
   exit
 fi
 
-# Do this early to prevent later interactive need
-docker login docker.io

replies.bodyText: same observation would apply to the WFLYISSUE I suppose
replies.author: tomjenkinson
